achievements.name: First Steps
achievements.description: Choose your starter Pokemon in Hoenn

achievements.name: Budding Researcher
achievements.description: Register 10 Pokemon in the Hoenn Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokemon Enthusiast
achievements.description: Register 50 Pokemon in the Hoenn Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokedex Master
achievements.description: Register 100 Pokemon in the Hoenn Pokedex

achievements.name: Hoenn Completionist
achievements.description: Complete the Hoenn Pokedex

achievements.name: Stone Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Roxanne and earn the Stone Badge

achievements.name: Knuckle Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Brawly and earn the Knuckle Badge

achievements.name: Dynamo Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Wattson and earn the Dynamo Badge

achievements.name: Heat Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Flannery and earn the Heat Badge

achievements.name: Balance Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Norman and earn the Balance Badge

achievements.name: Feather Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Winona and earn the Feather Badge

achievements.name: Mind Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Tate & Liza and earn the Mind Badge

achievements.name: Rain Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Wallace and earn the Rain Badge

achievements.name: Hoenn Gym Champion
achievements.description: Defeat all 8 Gym Leaders in Hoenn

achievements.name: Dark Master Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Sidney of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Ghost Master Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Phoebe of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Ice Master Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Glacia of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Dragon Master Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Drake of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four Conqueror
achievements.description: Defeat all members of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Hoenn Champion
achievements.description: Defeat Steven and become the Pokemon Champion

achievements.name: Titan of the Earth
achievements.description: Capture the legendary Groudon
